original_title: New US dietary guidelines to be announced as HHS, USDA look to 'ensure transparency' | Fox News
article_summary: USDA and HHS, under the leadership of Secretaries Rollins and Kennedy, are conducting a review of the 2025 Dietary Guidelines for Americans, aiming to release the updated report by December. The review aims to ensure transparency, minimize conflicts of interest, and base the guidelines on sound science, not political science. The HHS also plans to eliminate the GRAS loophole used by ingredient manufacturers.</s>
